item.title: Getting started with nexus
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting Nexus Repository Manager 3.x set up or installed.

item.title: Getting started with Nexus Repository Manager
item.description: Prerequisites # To get Nexus Repository Manager 2 running so you can use it with Maven, you need to run through a few steps before you install the repository manager itself. Download and install the Oracle JRE, version 7 or newer (suggest using version 8, because, duh). It can be obtained at the following link: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html Download Apache Maven from the following link: http://maven.apache.org/download.cgi Download Nexus Repository Manager 2 from the following link: https://www.
